p.span: The program has a number of settings that you can change as you want.
In order to open the settings, you need to go to Settings -> program Settings (CTRL + K).

Note that the settings are saved in a separate file, which is located in the Settings folder next to the executable file, this is done so that you can simply transfer the settings from one computer to another. Changing the settings file is highly undesirable and may damage the file and reset it to the default settings.
